Now, as for story ideas, here's one inspired by an alternate take on the Sly & The Curse of the 3 Bracelets story by Virus-20.

Link to the comic story: https://www.deviantart.com/virus-20/gall...

Story 1: Sly & The Gang In...Bloated Infancy!

During a midnight heist to steal from a shady ambassador, Sly brought along Penelope to get past the security systems. Their prize? A pair of pristine bracelets from ancient Greece, said to once belong to Plutus, the Greek God of abundance. However, when Carmelita attempts to apprehend the two, she accidentally unleashes the bracelets on both herself, and an unwitting Penelope. And as the days go by, the two ladies soon find themselves with bulkier bodies, as well as some bulkier undergarments.

Will they be able to free themselves from this supernatural affliction? Or will it be too late to reverse their cursed forms?

Now then, what do you think?

11421.content:
==Ambassador DeVinci's Residence==
==Rome, Italy==
==12:21 PM==

"Okay! I'm almost in. Are you sure this is a good idea, Sly?" Penelope asked, discreetly hacking into the security system from her laptop, along with subtly showing her concerns regarding their current heist. Meanwhile, Sly was stretching his legs a little to distract himself whilst the petite mousette was doing her thing.

"Of course, Penelope! After all, we wouldn't be pulling a heist if this British ambassador wasn't so shady, now would we?" Sly retorted, twirling his signature Cooper Clan cane within his fingertips, just to keep his wits as sharp as ever. It came with the territory of being a descendant from a long lineage of master thieves, after all.

Once he finished with a double-jump backflip, Sly looked back towards the meek mouse, his cane slung against his right shoulder, as he then spoke toward Penelope and quipped, "...And besides, didn't you say to Bentley earlier that you wanted to get "out of your comfort zone"? You know, to contribute more to the gang?"

In response, Penelope couldn't help but blush a little, due to her tiny child-like crush on the appealing raccoon thief, along with momentarily thinking back to the adorkable turtle known as Bentley, as she finally tapped into the inner circuitry of the private security system, to which she spoke into her Binocucom and asked, "Okay, all set to go on our end! Any luck, Bentley?"

"--Almost got it. There! You now have access to Mr. DeVinci's private collection. Murray and I will meet you back at the van. Good luck, guys!" Bentley replied over the private comms, finally cracking the encryption algorithms and firewalls that were allocated in Ambassador DeVinci's residential security system.

From there, the double doors leading into said private collection room, Sly and Penelope cautiously entered inside the expansive gallery, which was adorned with two dozen works of art encased in glass displays. Originally, if Penelop didn't hack into the security systems with Bentley's assistance, the two would've had to deal with tightly gridded trip lasers allong the floor.

Trivial for someone like Sly Cooper, but extremely difficult for someone of Penelope's skill set.

As they slowly made their way through the rows displayed artifacts, Sly and Penelope soon stopped at their intended prize: A pair of bronze-coated arm bracelets, each adorned with a singular pristine sapphire gem in the center. According to the briefing prior, it is said that these bracelets were blessed by Plutus, the Greek God of abundance, hence the Greek engravings inlaid onto the bracelets' surface.

"Wow. It's actually rather beautiful when you see them up-close." Penelope whispered, to which Sly simply replied, "Yeah. Too bad for DeVinci that he won't be in possession of them for much longer."

From there, Sly placed a gadget specialized in stealthily cutting through class containers, carefully tracing a large enough hole to cut open and grab the bracelets. Thankfully, all the self-practice paid off, as they were soon able to get at the artifacts, with Sly displaying a smug smirk and quipped, "Too easy."

"Yes, it is." A female voice rang out, as a metallic click could be heard behind the duo. They instinctively raised their hands upon realizing who they were dealing with, where the raccoon thief soon casually chirped, "Hey, Carmelita."

"Can it, Ringtail. You're under arrest." Carmelita snapped, aiming her Shock Pistol squarely at Sly, to which Penelope attempted the defuse the tension and said, "Look, Inspector Fox. We're just trying to take these bracelets back from Mr. DeVinci. You should know by now that he's corrupt."

"I'm well aware of that! That's why I've been here for almost a month undercover." She loudly whispered, switching her aimed line of sight on Penelope, too distracted to notice Sly slowly going for a smoke bomb in his leg pouch, then returning his hand to it's previous position before the feisty vixen was none the wiser, whilst Carmelita continued, "...That is, of all the criminals in the world, two members of the Cooper Gang just so happened to waltz right into DeVinci's private collection--"

As quick as the wind, Sly then threw the smoke bomb toward the ground, causing it to detonate in front of Carmelita, temporarily blinding her! However, as Sly and Penelope dove out of the Shock Pistol's line of fire, Carmelita, with her vision hindered by the sudden blast of smoke, fired randomly around her, hoping to hit either Penelope or Sly.

However, that was the least of her problems, as her sporadic shooting inadvertently shattered the glass container holding the bracelets. In turn, as a second shock blast was fired, it hit both bracelets in unison, which, oddly enough, began to glow with a weak ethereal glowing aura.

And, as if in a flash, the bracelets suddenly flung off the display stand, where one clasped itself upon Carmelita's exposed wrist, while the other bracelet zoomed over to Penelope, then magically sealed itself upon the mousette's own wrist! In turn, both women felt a shocking stinging sensation, causing them to collapse onto their knees in sudden pain, clasping their arms in the process!

Quickly, as the alarm was about to blare out, Sly instinctively grabbed Penelope, dragged her along by the arm, and jumped out of the opened window in the previous room they used to enter the estate! From, despite the extra load of carrying an in-pain Penelope, Sly sprinted towards the Cooper Van, as Bentley opened the backdoors yelling, "Quick! Get in!"

In a last bit of desperation, Sly tossed Penelope into the van, just as he dove inside as well, as Bentley closed the backdoors while Murray floored it on the gas pedal. Suffice to say, it wasn't exactly a clean getaway.

114212.content:
They say that the truth is stranger than fiction.

Or at least...that's how it usually was.

Penelope wasn't usually someone who would sleep in late, as she slowly arose from the bed within the private room that all of the Cooper Gang had equipped in most of their safehouses across the globe. "Ugh, my head..." She thought, slowly arising from the bed, her head throbbing as if somebody conked her with a ratchet wrench. Grasping her forehead some, Penelope eventually came to notice how she was no longer in her usual ensemble from the night before, save for her golden brown shirt.

"...What happened last night?" She mentally asked, only to then see one half of the pair of artifacts they intended to steal now firmly wrapped around her wrist. In turn, her initial response was that of shock, blinking twice to thrice to make sure she wasn't hallucinating.

"Huh? How...H-How did this get on me?" She questioned aloud, putting a hand upon the cusp of the ornate bracelet, performing a few experimental tugs, which only proved how persistent the item was in staying on it's wearer's wrist. Eventually, after a few harder tugs, Penelope ultimately gave up on trying to dislodge the metallic jewelry from her arm, huffing in protest at this disposition.

But then, her attention was turned towards the bedroom door, to where she saw none other than Bentley in the doorway, as he rolled over to her in his wheelchair as he quipped, "Merciful Hades! Thank goodness you're okay." Eventually, he made his way to her side by the bed, still in his wheelchair.

From there, he placed a concerned hand upon the mousette's now nude hand, looked at her directly behind his spectacles and calmly asked, "...H-How are you feeling, Penelope?"

"I'm fine, Bentley. My ego is a little bruised, but...it'll heal." She replied, lightly bumping her rodent snout against Bentley's reptilian nose in a meek form of affection between the two blossoming "love-nerds", as Sly would jokingly refer to them as. In response, an upward curve of his lips appeared as he then said, "That's...That's really good to hear."

"Yeah, I suppose so. But..." Penelope interjected, to where she showed Bentley how she's unable to strip the bracelet from her wrist in emphasis, then continued, "...How did this even get on me anyway?"

"I'm...I'm not completely sure myself, but--" Bentley elaborated, only to be interrupted by the abrupt yet sudden noise of Penelope's stomach growling up a storm. Of course, it elicit a greatly embarrassed blush upon the mousette's face, her eyes looking away from the handicapped turtle out of sheer embarrassment.

Of course, both she and Bentley blushed by this unexpected intrusion, to which Penelope attempted to remedy the situation by meekly retorting, "Wow, I...I-I honestly didn't know I was so hungry." "Yeah, that's...That's strange. Luckily, we were about to sit down and breakfast. I assume you want to join us?"

At first, Penelope wanted to save face. But on second thought, a subtle suggestion wiggled it's way into her mind, wanting her to take Bentley up on his offer, and so she did by replying, "Actually, Bentley...I'd love to sit down with you, Sly, and Murray."

And with that, Penelope slowly dismounted from the bed, following close behind Bentley, hand-in-hand like two blossoming lovebirds. However, little did the turtle and mousette realize as they exited the bedroom, there was a noticeable tire-sized stain embedded upon the bedsheets. Was it all a mere coincidence? Or...was something far more devious going on?

==5 Minutes & 23 Seconds Later==

Shock and awe.

Those were the only words that could be described by the original three Cooper Gang members as to what was transporting before them.

Sly had a slight wide-eyed expression.

Bentley had a confused yet quizzical look on his glasses-wearing facial features.

And Murray...well, he merely watched as he bit into a large grilled cheese sandwich.

Though, as to what they were gawking at? A quite ravenous Penelope devouring full platters of food with an air of gluttonous gusto, one that would put even Murray to shame. However, what shocked the trio the most was how Penelope was packing all that food in, considering her petite physique.

Whilst she was voraciously gulping down a beer mug full of Orange juice, she momentarily ceased her gluttonous assault to look at her compatriots in a confused expression, cocking a mousey eyebrow in response and asked, "... Do I got something on my face?"

Obviously, they tried to disguise their confused expressions by faking it that they were none the wiser. Though, despite being proficient in their occupations as thieves, they weren't hiding their awkwardness of Penelope's newly emboldened appetite, as the pink-furred mousette was onto them so easily, swallowing a large mouthful of waffle slices, which landed in her now expanded stomach, now sporting an orb-like bulge on her abdomen, and it was still growing little by little.

1142122.content:
"¡¿Qué demonios es esto?! (What the hell is this!?)"

Those were the very words that the reputable Inspector Carmelita Fox shrieked in her native tongue, especially when it came to a shocking revelation seen before her:

Instead of her usual laced blue undergarments, she found only dozens of thick crinkly diapers in place of aforementioned panties, as they were neatly placed in the underwear drawer. However, what surprised her prior to eliciting such a peeved reaction, she had awoken to find herself in equally bulky padding around her private area.

However, much to her utter embarrassment...the infantile undergarment was actually mildly damp from urine, which all the more warranted the furiously embarrassed blushing on her vulpine cheeks. After all, the last time she ever had to wear such humiliating garments was when she was a little girl still learning how to potty train.

"...H-How the hell did this even happen?" She muttered under her own breath, to which her attention soon turned to the bracelet around her wrist. From there, an angry scowl began to form on her face and snout, where she then began to impulsively yank at the bracelet in frustration as she growled, "You... You did this!"

She began to violently wrestle with the bracelet in an attempt to violently dislodge it from her arm, circling around her room a little in the process. However, as if it seemed to possess a will of it's own, the bracelet suddenly crackled with ethereal electricity, the bolts zapping all over the room, as one of the sparks zapped the diaper that Carmelita was wearing, since she was wearing only her skivvies when she discovered her embarrassing conundrum upon waking up.

From there, much to her utter frustration, Carmelita soon felt her diaper inflate and puff outwards just an inch or three, exclaiming it's expansion with an audible *Poof-POMF!* in the process. Instinctively, she stopped herself from tampering with her inanimate captor to prevent any further embarrassment, to which the bracelet ceased it's magical discharge.

Once everything calmed down, Carmelita attempted to stand up to assess the damage, only to feel the extra cushioning on her womanhood, buttocks, and the space between her legs, thus forcing her leg stance to widen by a small but noticeable amount.

"*sigh* Excelente. Simplemente genial (Great. Just great). They're thicker now. *frustrated sigh*" She muttered aloud, obviously not amused by the infantile-themed turn of events, noting how much the now bulkier diaper made her butt look just a tad bit fatter if she was wearing her stretchy blue pants right now.

"...Now how am I supposed to do my job with this stupid thing?" She huffed, poking at the inflated front of her diaper once and twice, clearing becoming irritated by how damp the crinkly undergarment was by now. Much to her begrudging demeanor at this point, Carmelita ultimately admitted defeat, exhaling a defeated sigh in the process as she lightly growled, "*sigh* Alright, fine! You win. I'll get chssnged into a fresh one. Estúpida pulsera mágica ... (Stupid magic bracelet...)"

As Carmelita stripped herself of the wet diaper and grabbed a new one from the drawer, she still had a profusely embarrassed blush upon her cheeks, her thoughts allocating as to what her colleagues would think of her if they saw her in such an embarrassing state, thinking aloud as she muttered, "...I swear, if Winthorp walks in here right now while I'm doing...this, I'll never hear the end of it...*shudders*"

Oddly enough, there was a small kit for diaper changes, such as baby powder and baby wipes, in the same drawer as the aforementioned diapers, as Carmelita noted how thick the crinkly undergarments as the one she wore prior. Suffice to say, the vulpine Interpol officer had a bad hunch that this won't be the last time she'll be using a diaper anytime soon.

However, back at their safehouse, Sly stood beside Bentley, who was currently preoccupied with crunching data algorithms in order to figure out what exactly was going on with Penelope. Time and time again, it consistently came up as the following:

"ERROR! Unable to identify source. Please relocate to a different search engine."

"Drat! And curses!" Bentley exclaimed in mild frustration, rubbing the side of his temple in miniscule annoyance. Sly, however, was supportive of his brainy friend, patting him on the shoulder as he said, "It's okay, Bentley. We'll figure out another way."

"*sigh* I know, Sly. This whole situation has gotten...complicated." He answered, to which Sly attempted to alleviate the situation as he sarcastically jested, "...Well, look at it this way; It could probably be a lot worse."

"*sigh* You're probably right, Sly. But...this still doesn't explain how--" Bentley retorted, only to be cut off mid-sentence by Murray, who rushed in as if it was an emergency. Of course, the hippo then looked at his friends and hesitantly said, "Uh, guys...we might have a problem."

"What's going on, big guy?" The raccoon thief asked, to which Murray scratched his head a little in mild hesitation on what he was about to say. Ultimately, he exhaled a deep breath and confessed, "It's, uh... Y-You better come see for yourselves."

Initially confused from what their comrade just said, Sly and Bentley followed the brawn of the Cooper Gang, only to see a rather...interesting sight laid out before them:

"Sorry, pal. I don't see anything wrong with--" Sly loudly whispered, thinking that there initially wasn't anything particularly wrong with the mousette aside from her now bloated overpacked stomach. However, he stopped mid-sentence when he accidentally stepped into something rather...wet, which left a mildly gross feeling in his blue socks.

"What the?" He quipped, lifting his foot off the floor, now seeing his left sock was now soaked. However, Bentley being the egghead of the group besides Penelope, used a biometric device to identify the wet surface, only for the group to find out....

== 4 Days Later... ==

== Carmelita's Apartment ==

A door opened into the apartment, as a bloated bulbous orange-furred form frustratingly squeezed it's way inside, occasionally getting itself stuck in the doorway due to bearing such wide hips.

"¡Venga! Estúpida puerta... (Come on! Stupid doorway...)" She groaned in her native tongue, forcibly pushing herself free from the restrictive confines of the wooden doorway frame, until Carmelita was able to free herself with a muffled *Plop!*, causing her to land belly-first onto the carpet floor with a slight of embarrassment upon her now chubbier face, though it was more akin to frustrated annoyance than anything else.

Slowly standing up from the floor, a loud set of crinkling noises could be heard, reminding the bluenette vixen of her current plight, as a thick padded diaper could be made out underneath her now skintight blue pants. In her plump hand, she held the current source of her frustrations for the moment:

A pink slip envelope, which meant she was on temporary leave from Interpol, due to her current stature and weight.

Her superior, Chief Inspector James Barkley, made it abundantly clear that she was to take a leave of absence until she lost the excess weight. Muttering to herself, she said, " "You're not returning until you've lost the weight." Bah! You think I haven't tried that already at this point, Barkley?!"

As she undo the holster for her Shock Pistol and set it on the Kitchen Island alongside her badge, Carmelita huffed as she lumbered towards her couch, with the combination of her increased weight and her padded undergarments causing her to now have a waddling gait.

From there, upon sitting her now fattened self upon the furniture, it groaned and creaked some from the excess weight, along with her bulky diaper crinkling up a storm. In response, Carmelita placed her plumped up face into the palms of her chubby hands, both in complete embarrassment and humiliation, as if her current predicament reminded her of a difficult period of her childhood...

No! She wasn't going to let this massive drawback in her life affect her emotional state, as she looked back at the bracelet around her fattened arm and wrist, which seemed to grew along with her. Her brow furrowed into a scowl, to which she lowly growled, "You... This is all your fault, estúpido pedazo de basura (you stupid hunk of junk)!"

Overall, it was a Public Relations nightmare on Interpol's behalf for one of their best officers.

From there, as she grabbed an ice cream scooper from the drawer, she waddled back toward the couch, along with fetching her personal laptop, as a plan began to formulate in her mind...

"--I don't know, Penelope! How should I know?!" Sly retorted, feeling every hefty pound that Carmelita administered upon the safehouse door. From there, as if out of annoyance, Carmelita yelled behind the door and explained, "Don't play dumb with me, ringtail! I know that your mousey friend is wearing the other bracelet! I found your hideout because she's been ordering un camión lleno de comida (a truckload of food) from the local McQuack's burger joint for the past few days!"

Upon hearing what the bluenette vixens said, Sly looked back at Penelope, who now bore a noticeable blush of shame on her chubby rodent face, giving her a glare that said "We'll discuss this later", to which he then diverted his attention back towards their uninvited guest as he queried, "Oh yeah? And what makes you think I'm gonna let you in?"

In response, Carmelita exhaled a frustrated huff, then pulled out the pink slip envelope she received prior, and flatly shoved it through the small mail slip in the door as she answered, "Read it, estúpido (stupid)!"

Cautiously, Penelope bent down (or at least, as much as she could at her current size and weight) and picked up the pink envelope. From there, she opened it to pull out it's contents, and after a short read of what was written, Penelope looked back at her compatriots and explained, "Guys...This is a pink slip."

"A pink slip? Then that means--" Bentley replied, upon realizing what that meant for their unwanted guest, as Carmelita then reluctantly confessed, "--My bosses laid me off. If I wanted to arrest you and your friends, Cooper, I would've brought backup. However, you saw what's become of me, Ringtail, because of this stupid bracelet."

A moment of silence stirred throughout the safehouse, as they could easily tell how desperate Carmelita almost sounded, with Sly being the first to acknowledge this revelation, followed by Penelope, then Murray, and finally Bentley. After all, Sly had a thing for Carmelita for some time now, that much was certain, as the ringtailed thief was the first to break the silence and said, "*sigh*...Okay, Carmelita. We're opening the door. Just...don't shoot us."

From there, Sly and Murray slowly unlatched the door's built-in barricades, to where Sly then slowly opened the door for the ashamed bluenette vixens, to which she was currently wearing...
